Create 2 grp report in html and write data to xlsx table

Source: R/tidyMS_MQ_workflow.R
make2grpReport.Rd

For use examples see run_scripts directory

make2grpReport(
  startdata,
  atable,
  GRP2,
  protein_annot = "Description",
  revpattern = "^REV_",
  contpattern = "^zz|^CON__",
  remove = FALSE
)

write_2GRP(GRP2, outpath, xlsxname = "AnalysisResults")

render_2GRP(GRP2, outpath, htmlname = "Result2Grp", word = FALSE)

Arguments

startdata

table in long format

atable

AnalysisTableAnnotation annotate startdata table

GRP2

return value of make2grpReport

protein_annot

column with protein description e.g. (fasta header)

revpattern

default "REV_"

contpattern

default "^zz|^CON__"

remove

do you want to remove contaminants default (TRUE)

outpath

path to place output

xlsxname

file name for xlsx

htmlname

name for html file

word

default FALSE, if true create word document.

Examples


istar <- prolfqua_data('data_ionstar')$filtered()
#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
data <- istar$data |> dplyr::filter(protein_Id %in% sample(protein_Id, 100))
data$Description <-"AAAAA"

GRP2 <- list()
GRP2$Bfabric <- list()
GRP2$Bfabric$projectID <- "3765"
GRP2$Bfabric$projectName <- "Order_26863"
GRP2$Bfabric$orderID <- "3765"

GRP2$Bfabric$workunitID <- "2057368.zip"
GRP2$Bfabric$inputID <- "2057368.zip"
GRP2$Bfabric$inputURL <- "https://www.fgcz.ch"

#at least 2 peptides per protein
GRP2$pop <- list()
GRP2$pop$transform <- "vsn"
GRP2$pop$aggregate <- "medpolish"
GRP2$pop$Diffthreshold <- 0.5
GRP2$pop$FDRthreshold <- 0.25
GRP2$pop$Contrasts <- c(b_vs_a = "dilution.b - dilution.a")

GRP2$Software <- "MaxQuant"

data <- dplyr::filter(data, dilution. == "a" |  dilution. == "b")
atab <- AnalysisTableAnnotation$new()

atab$fileName = "raw.file"
atab$hierarchy["protein_Id"] = "protein_Id"
atab$hierarchy["peptide_Id"] = "peptide_Id"
atab$factors["dilution."] = "dilution."
atab$setWorkIntensity("peptide.intensity")
atab$isotopeLabel = "isotope"
config <- prolfqua::AnalysisConfiguration$new(atab)

protein_annot = "Description"
grp <- make2grpReport(data, atab, GRP2)
#> sampleName already exists
#> completing cases
#> Joining, by = c("sampleName", "protein_Id", "peptide_Id")
#> AGGREGATING PEPTIDE DATA!
#> removing proteins with less than2 peptpides
#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
#> starting aggregation
#> Warning: medpolish() did not converge in 10 iterations
#> FORMULA :medpolish ~ dilution.
#> Joining, by = "protein_Id"
#> determine linear functions:
#> compute contrasts:
#> computing contrasts.
#> Joining, by = c("contrast", "protein_Id")
#> completing cases
#> b_vs_a=dilution.b - dilution.a
#> completing cases
#> Joining, by = c("protein_Id", "contrast")
#> Joining, by = c("protein_Id", "contrast")

if (FALSE) {

render_2GRP(grp, ".")
render_2GRP(grp, "." ,word = TRUE)
write_2GRP(grp,".")
}
